name: Noah (Cymus)
description:
Apparently WebGL builds have broken keyboard inputs so you have to press REALLY hard for it to move even an inch, I'm sorry.
I also recommend NOT playing on fullscreen.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

You control your left hand with Q/leftClick and your right hand with E/rightClick

Q/E ---- pick up/craft items
leftClick/rightClick ---- use/drop items

A/D ---- steer the ark
W/S ---- control speed of the ark

How to play:
Small animals can be caught with a net. Larger ones require a bolas and the biggest ones even two. After catching an animal go to it and one of your sons will bring it to the ark. After sending all three you need to get back.

Combine different items you find to craft tools:
fiber + fiber = rope
rope + fiber = net
rope + stone = bolas
stone + wheat = seeds (will spawn a bird you can catch)
carrot (use it to lure a rabbit) 

When in the ark watch out for obstacles, as they will cause your animals to fall out. The same goes for sharks that you can fight off by throwing spears. You also have a hunger bar you can fill by catching fish at a site (appears as bubbles)

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This is my first game jam and first actually finished game ever. I was also working only for 4 days instead of 7 and I really am very proud of myself for making it. The bugs are unfortunate, but I am very happy with my work. Thank you for playing!!!
